Title: Gods and Monsters
Description:
Dear $p,

Is it true that the mogu are really connected to the titans? I find this very hard to believe. But looking over your research, some of the truth about the mogu begins to take shape.

If you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.

Thank you for your diligence!

Sincerely,

Lorewalker Cho
ObjectivesText: Bring the Gods and Monsters to Lorewalker Cho.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
RewardText:
Your research is most distressing. But it sheds light on a truth we have long sought: "Where did the mogu come from? And why were they such tyrants?"

We will add this knowledge to your collection. If you wish me to narrate this for you, simply point at the correct volume in your Private Collection.
